name: MLCGradientClippingType
desc: A clipping type the system applies to a gradient.

items.name: case byValue
items.desc: An option that clips by value.

items.name: case byNorm
items.desc: An option that clips by norm.

items.name: case byGlobalNorm
items.desc: An option that clips by global norm.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual description of the gradient clipping type, suitable for debugging.
